name: Blob Invasion
description:
Hello! And welcome to Blob Invasion, a game made by Kells McDonald III! 

Story

In this game you play as Luwee, a friendly blob who wishes to leave his friends and explore the new world. However, his blob friends do not want to see him go to Earth, so now they've invaded the planet to take him back! 

Objective

The goal of the game is to survive for as long as possible!

Price

Pay what you want, however this game is FREE. Donations are extremely appreciated!
